00003  *
00004  *       Filename:  genericTracePktGen.h
00005  *
00006  *    Description: Used to inject traces from a cycle accurate simulator into
00007  *    iris as network traffic.
00008  *    Does have some additional queues for mshr modelling which a genericTPG
00009  *    does not need. TODO: Remove mshr modelling.
